sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>bundle</radical> of <radical>geoduck</radical>s is something you can always <kanji>trust</kanji>.
meaningInfo: A bundle of geoducks will never lie, never let you down, and never disappoint you. You can trust them completely.
readingMnemonic: While you can <kanji>trust</kanji> a bundle of geoducks, never ever trust <reading>rye</reading> (<ja>らい</ja>) bread.
readingInfo: Imagine a bundle of geoducks and a piece rye bread. Think about how you can trust the geoducks but you can't trust the rye bread.
